name: Catharium
description: Catharium is an upcoming first-person puzzle game with strong narrative elements. You play as Thomas Drewitt, a recently deceased man that finds himself in an ambiguous form of afterlife, where he is guided through the five stages of grief by a mysterious figure known as The Undertaker. To reach the final stage of ‘acceptance’, the player must overcome each stage of grief by completing puzzles and talking with various characterizations that ultimately help Thomas to navigate his way through each emotion associated with grief.
